nodes.text: Cambriele SolidState was a manufacturer of power cells. It was headquartered on the Core World of Ralltiir for the sole intention of being able to claim it was a Core-based company. Cambriele SolidState's manufacturing facilities were strategically located throughout the Empire. The company produced power cells for use in multiple products including airspeeders, blasters, comlinks, glowrods, nanny droids, and gamepacks. Cambriele also provided the Imperial Military with power cells.
